query.statement: SELECT SCHD_ID, USER_ID, SCHD_TITLE, SCHD_CONTENTS, SCHD_STARTDATE, SCHD_ENDDATE, SCHD_PLACE FROM MIP_SCHD #if ($SEARCH_CONDITION.length()>0 && "0" == $SEARCH_CONDITION) WHERE SCHD_TITLE like '%' || :SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%' #end

INSERT INTO MIP_SCHD (SCHD_ID, USER_ID, SCHD_TITLE, SCHD_CONTENTS, SCHD_STARTDATE, SCHD_ENDDATE, SCHD_PLACE) VALUES('SCHD-'|| SCHD_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, :USER_ID, :SCHD_TITLE, :SCHD_CONTENTS, :SCHD_STARTDATE, :SCHD_ENDDATE, :SCHD_PLACE)
UPDATE MIP_SCHD SET SCHD_TITLE =:SCHD_TITLE, SCHD_CONTENTS =:SCHD_CONTENTS , SCHD_STARTDATE =:SCHD_STARTDATE, SCHD_ENDDATE =:SCHD_ENDDATE, SCHD_PLACE =:SCHD_PLACE WHERE SCHD_ID=:SCHD_ID
